about_the_game:
Soul Dungeons shape themselves after their controller’s soul, holding the key to the island's survival. The Belmonte family's control over these dungeons gives them power over the island, but rumors suggest their involvement with a cult and a connection to your parents' disappearance. As a hunter with hidden abilities, you're tasked not only with capturing monsters but also with aiding the island's inhabitants and uncovering your true identity.

Over 100 Ammons:

There's a whole world of monsters just waiting to be captured. You might even be lucky enough to stumble upon a legendary Ammon! What's an Ammon? Ammo + Monster

Legendary Casters:

Legendary weapons known as casters are scattered around the island. These weapons, accessible to those fortunate enough to find them, hold immense power and allow for extraordinary battle strategies.

Multiplayer:

Though primarily a single-player experience, the game also offers multiplayer aspects.

- PvP Battles:
Prove your skill in PvP battles. Show your friends and fellow hunters who has the ultimate squad.

- Monster Trading:
Expand your Ammon collection by trading with friends and players worldwide.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Designed for Virtual Reality!
  • Capture and catalog over 100 unique Ammons.
  • Voiced single player story
  • Turn Based ATB Combat System
  • Diverse Exploration Areas: Unearth secrets around the island and the dungeons.
  • Original Soundtrack.
  • PvP Battles and Monster Trading: Prove your battle skills against players, and expand your collection through strategic monster trades.

name: Cartridge Monsters: Rebirth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or RX 370
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR or OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Requires VR Headset, Oculus or Valve Index recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-6600k or i7-6700HQ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or RX 480
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR or OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Requires VR Headset, Oculus or Valve Index recommended.

short_description: Cartridge Monsters: Rebirth is a VR Creature Collection RPG. Hunt and capture over 100 monsters across Phantom Island. Visit towns, complete quests, rank up, and clear dungeons in this single-player story.
